# Cloudflare Documentation

> Source: https://developers.cloudflare.com/
> Category: services
> Cached: 2026-02-08

## Welcome to Cloudflare

Explore guides and tutorials to start building on Cloudflare's platform.

## Featured

- AI tools
- Troubleshoot errors
- Register a domain
- Setup 1.1.1.1
- Get started with Cloudflare

## Developer Products

- **Workers** - Serverless compute platform
- **Pages** - JAMstack frontend deployment
- **R2** - Object storage (S3-compatible)
- **Images** - Image optimization
- **Stream** - Video delivery

## AI Products

- **AI Search** - AI-powered search
- **Workers AI** - Serverless AI inference
- **Vectorize** - Vector database
- **AI Gateway** - AI API gateway
- **AI Playground** - Experiment with AI

## Zero Trust (Cloudflare One)

- **Access** - Zero Trust network access
- **Tunnel** - Secure tunnels to origins
- **Gateway** - Secure web gateway
- **Browser Isolation** - Remote browser isolation
- **Replace your VPN** - Zero Trust VPN alternative

## Build with Cloudflare

Example Worker patterns:

### Return HTML
```javascript
export default {
  async fetch(request) {
    const html = `<!DOCTYPE html>
      <body>
        <h1>Hello World</h1>
        <p>This markup was generated by a Cloudflare Worker.</p>
      </body>`;
    return new Response(html, {
      headers: {
        "content-type": "text/html;charset=UTF-8",
      },
    });
  },
};
```

### Return JSON
```javascript
export default {
  async fetch(request) {
    const data = { hello: "world" };
    return Response.json(data);
  },
};
```

### Proxy/Fetch
```javascript
export default {
  async fetch(request) {
    const remote = "https://example.com";
    return await fetch(remote, request);
  },
};
```

## Developer Platform

Serverless execution environment without configuring or maintaining infrastructure.

## WARP Client

The Cloudflare WARP client provides faster, more secure, and private internet experience.

## Cloudflare Tunnel

Secure way to connect resources to Cloudflare without publicly routable IP addresses.

## Key Topics

- Origin CA certificates
- Nameserver configuration
- SSL/TLS encryption modes
- WAF rules and country-based access
